rows.label: qst711402_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! As expected, you've
already found them.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0002
rows.name: One Bat Hinge and one Scarlet Coil...

rows.label: qst711402_msg0004
rows.name:
As I thought, the machine parts
from Gula are a little different
from the ones from Iira.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0006
rows.name:
You all can keep using
the Seeker Machine.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0007
rows.name:
With your skills, I'm sure you can
collect many more machine parts.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0008
rows.name:
There are also gold machine parts,
from which you can apparently
collect even more valuable parts.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0009
rows.name:
But to collect those, you'll need a
more high-performance Seeker Machine,
so do your best to build one.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0010
rows.name:
Well then, thank you all! Thanks
to you, I got some good parts!

rows.label: qst711402_msg0101
rows.name:
What? You can't find the
materials to make the
Seeker Machine - Silver?

rows.label: qst711402_msg0102
rows.name:
The Krabble Carapace needed to make the
Seeker Machine - Silver can be found at
the Serene Springside around here.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0103
rows.name:
By the way, even if you gather the materials,
the Seeker Machine - Silver can only be built
by someone with knowledge of machines.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0104
rows.name:
Is there anyone among you
from the Superbian Empire?

rows.label: qst711402_msg0105
rows.name:
Someone from that country
might be able to build it.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0106
rows.name:
Also, what I'm looking for now is
one Bat Hinge and one Scarlet Coil.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0107
rows.name:
These are often found in
"silver machine parts," so
please look carefully.
